== Description ==
Calls the [[remove_node]] function, and passes on the node $id argument.

== Usage ==
%%%<?php $wp_admin_bar->remove_menu( $id ); ?>%%%

== Parameters ==
{{Parameter|$id|string|The node ID of the Toolbar item you want to remove .}}
